name: Another Space Shooter (Glitched Gryphon)
description:
T'is but another endless retro space shooter. The ship follows your cursor and you can right-click to fire your lasers!

The game has a few powerups: Lightning bolt - speed boost, Shield - restores up to 3 shields or gives 500 points if you're at max shield capacity, star - gives 500 points

Art was done by Ansimuz and Kenny

The main soundtrack is Space Force Activate by Mikey Geiger

All the coding, sound effects, and scene-building were done by me, Glitched Gryphon
